content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Remember, recovery is a process, and it's all about finding what works best for your body. Don't be afraid to experiment and try new things. And don't forget to listen to your body and take rest days when you need them.

Most importantly, have fun and enjoy the process of getting back into basketball and bike riding! It's great that you're taking care of your body and making healthy choices.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Good luck with your fitness journey, and I hope you crush your basketball games and bike rides!
